column5: The new spam bots are getting pretty good at getting through. I received a good tip on keeping them out. Apparently if they receive a request in a field box they are not programmed for, they enter random text. I've created a new mandatory field in which anyone who registers now must enter the number 987654321. It tells you to do exactly that...but somehow this baffles the bots. We've had several spam bots lately and apparently the internet is being besieged by them. Hope this can slows the my mom hates me down a bit at least.

Good thing I registered when I did....I got this discount keyboard from a guy selling them on a table down at the market for $2.99....when I got it home, I found I was missing the number "7".  It's ok though....I never seem to need that one.
Thanks Rick...keep up the good work!!  dk
wtg Rick, every step to reduce spam here is very appreciated!  Mike
. Gee Rick,ya getting deviouser and deviouser[?] Good on ya Cobber!
